snippet: Former Wimbledon champion Andy Murray has joined the fathers' club at the top of men's tennis after his wife Kim gave birth to a daughter at the weekend....
lead_paragraph: Former Wimbledon champion Andy Murray has joined the fathers' club at the top of men's tennis after his wife Kim gave birth to a daughter at the weekend.

headline.print_headline: Murray Joins Fathers' Club After Wife Kim Gives Birth
headline.main: Murray Joins Fathers' Club After Wife Kim Gives Birth
